item.description:
Rain Background Sounds! ğŸŒ§ï¸ ğŸ”Š

Don't want to just watch rain, but hear it too? You can now choose from a lovely collection of rain sounds, including heavy rain, light rain, rain on car glass, and thunderstorms. The sounds will automatically download when you relaunch Rainaissance after installing this update. Just head into the settings to choose a sound of your choice.

Note: I may add more rain sounds. The best part? They will automatically download for you without installing an update.
